name: Imp Familiar
damage_resistances: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

actions.name: Sting (Bite While Shapeshifted)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Shapeshift
actions.desc: The imp magically changes its form into a rat (speed 20 ft.)  raven (20 ft.  fly 60 ft.)  or spider (20 ft.  climb 20 ft.) or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form except for its movement speeds. Equipment it carries is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus_actions.name: Invisibility
bonus_actions.desc: The imp magically turns invisible, along with any equipment carried. This invisibility ends if the imp makes an attack, falls unconscious, or dismisses the effect.

special_abilities.name: Devils Sight
special_abilities.desc: The imps darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

special_abilities.name: Ventriloquism
special_abilities.desc: The imp can perfectly imitate any voice it has heard. It can make its voice appear to originate from any point within 30 feet.

special_abilities.name: Lawful Evil
special_abilities.desc: The imp radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The imp has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Familiar
special_abilities.desc: The imp can communicate telepathically with its master while they are within 1 mile of each other. When the imp is within 10 feet of its master, its master shares its Magic Resistance trait.
